DOC.brief_summary: This study multi-site , double-blinded , randomize , non-inferiority clinical trial inhale nitrous oxide oxygen ( N2O/O2 ) versus intravenous ( IV ) sedation , fentanyl midazolam , pain management adult woman pregnancy termination procedure 12 16 week gestational age .
DOC.brief_title: Nitrous Oxide Versus Intravenous Sedation Anesthesia
DOC.detailed_description: This study evaluate whether nitrous oxide feasible acceptable alternative IV sedation pain management early second trimester D & E . Primary endpoint include maximum procedural pain use visual analog scale ( VAS ) well satisfaction anesthesia use Iowa Satisfaction Anesthesia Scale .
